security-role.description: Readonly access to any test and testcase.
Write access to any test and testcase.
Can Flag a step as library and modify existing Step Libraries.
Delete access to any test and testcase.
Full access to any Test Data.
Readony access to any Envoronment data.

Can deploy a new Chain in an environment. ie : Can modify the build and revision for an environment.
